## CryptoTokenGenerator.generateHexToken() method

Generates a cryptographically secure random token in hexadecimal format.

**Signature:**

```typescript
generateHexToken(byteLength: number): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

byteLength


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The number of random bytes to generate (before hex encoding)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

A hexadecimal string representing the random bytes

## Example


```typescript
const token = generator.generateHexToken(16); // 32-character hex string
```
